name: Bazooka Rocket launcher Games
description:
The ultimate battle is going to extreme destruction as the enemy jet are heading and destroying your home army base. Be the hero of the battleground and shoot down the mighty air jets, aim carefully as it isn’t that much easy when the jets are moving and flying speedily. Now it’s up to you that how you have to defend and how quick you are destroying the attacking enemy jets! Be brave, steady; take aim according to the jet moment and fire!

Features:
• War Commander
• Battleground surroundings
• Realistic Bazooka Physics
• Real look jet destruction effects
• Entertaining Gameplay
